Curriculum

You can download my CV in PDF

  • Reasearch Intern at UberAI lab. Working with the Converational AI team on Reinforcement Learning problems.
  • Research Assistant at CAiRE lab of The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology supervised by Pascale Fung.
  • Teaching Assistant of: Building Interactive Intelligent Systems at HKUST and Advanced Programming at UniPi.
  • Adjunct Lecturer of Databases for Specialty School of Medical Physics of Pisa University.
  • Mentor at the Pisa CoderDojo (Volunteer Activity).
  • Research Assistant at the Center of Health Informatics in the HKBU Computer Science Department.

  • Ph.D. candidate in Electronic & Computer Engineering (Present)
    supervised by Pascale Fung.
  • M.Sc. degree in Computer Science at Pisa University 110/110
    Honours supervised by Prof. Giuseppe Attardi.
  • M.Sc. degree in Advanced Information Systems at HKBU 3.89/4.0 Distintion supervised by Prof. Liu Jiming.
  • B.Sc. degree in Computer Science at Perugia University 110/110 Honours supervised by Prof. Pinotti Maria Cristina.

  • PyTorch for in my research projects and also experienced in Tensorflow, Keras and SciKit Learn.
  • Python and Haskell are the languages I love.
  • LaTeX for everything, including slides.
  • I have experiences using Javascript, Java, PHP, SQL, ReactJs, Git, and D3.js.

  • Italian is my Native Language.
  • English is the language I usually use.
  • I speak very very basic Chinese, I am trying to learning it.
